thread.title: Two UAE soldiers martyred in Yemen
thread.title_full: Two UAE soldiers martyred in Yemen

title: Two UAE soldiers martyred in Yemen

organizations.name: general command of the uae armed forces

text: Two UAE soldiers martyred in Yemen WAM /Abu Dhabi   10.37 am Share More > Vote The General Command of the UAE Armed Forces offered its condolences to the families of the martyrs Two Emirati servicemen were martyred this Friday while on duty with the Saudi-led Arab Coalition's Operation Restoring Hope in Yemen. The General Command of the UAE Armed Forces has announced the martyrdom of serviceman Nader Mubarak Eisa Soliman and Soliman Mohammed Soliman Al Dhohouri while on duty with the Saudi-led Arab Coalition's Operation Restoring Hope in Yemen. The General Command of the UAE Armed Forces offered its condolences to the families of the martyrs, praying to Almighty Allah to rest their souls in eternal peace and bestow solace on their families. Share
